## hpr2959 :: Interview with Josh Clements about gpodder.net 

 
In today's show Ken interviews Josh Clements from the gpodder.net project.


Josh answered the call to arms he heard on the Ubuntu Podcast. We discuss the plan and explain how you can also get involved.

Links

https://github.com/gpodder/mygpo/blob/master/maintainer-needed.md
https://ubuntupodcast.org/2019/08/08/s12e18-pilotwings/
https://github.com/gpodder/
https://gpodder.github.io/docs/mailing-list.html
https://feeds.gpodder.net/
https://prgmr.com/xen/
support@gpodder.net
